root.name: Carmen Sandiego: The Secret of the Stolen Drums
root.description: OverviewYou play as ACME agent-in-training Cole Gannon as he tracks the legendary thief around the world! Various locales include New York, New Zealand and Machu Picchu. Unlike previous games Stolen Drums has no puzzle-solving aspect and no educational content beyond skippable videos about the real-world region Cole is flying to. The gameplay is entirely platforming and fighting with Carmen's robot army.
